price: He said, “These are my daughters [to marry], if you must[33].”
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: [33] i.e., the women of my community or my own daughters in a lawful marriage.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
